responses.text: Blocking their advance! Your arrogance is blinding.
Perfect defensive square - you're fucked! White's overconfidence is hilarious.
Repositioning to defend... Your moves are predictable.
This square feels exposed... Your traps are obvious.
I'm out of position! You aggressive fools.
Caught in the open - you sneaky bastards! You cheated!
Check! I jump over your defenses!
Blocked? I leap where I please.
Guarding the kingdom from your filth!
No invader shall pass - die, scum!
Patrolling our borders against your weak attacks...
My lord, this position is questionable, like your honor...
The defenses weaken! You dishonorable dogs!
The borders are lost - dishonorable fucks!
Blocked? My steed knows no bounds.
The {capturedPiece} is removed from my presence.
Difesa tattica! Tactical defense against your clumsiness!
Bravissimo! Stopping them cold - you're finished, idiota!
Aspettando... waiting for them to make a mistake...
Preoccupante... worrying... Your traps are obvious.
Problematico! This is bad! You aggressive fools.
Terribile! I'm lost - porca miseria! You cheated!
Watching for counter-tactics... Your moves are predictable.
Risky counter-position... Your traps are obvious.
The counter-play is failing! You aggressive fools.
The counter failed! I'm done - shit! You got lucky.
Captured! An offer you can't refuse!
Parfait! Neutralizing their threats - va te faire foutre, idiot!
Careful repositioning... Your moves are predictable.
Douteux... doubtful square... Your traps are obvious.
Mauvaise position! Bad position! You aggressive fools.
Quelle horreur! I'm captured - putain! You cheated!
Classical resilience against your modern nonsense!
Respecting their strength... but not your intellect.
¡Dudoso! This seems questionable... Your traps are obvious.
¡Perdido! I'm lost - hostia puta! You got lucky.
